data.title: MetaSolv Implementation Services
data.meta_description: MetaSolv Implementation Services - Download as a PDF or view online for free
data.text:
1. Oracle MetaSolv / Order & Service Management (OSM) / Unified Inventory Management (UIM) Offerings Oracle’s MetaSolv M6/OSM/UIM provides robust inventory and order management capabilities to facilitate the delivery of traditional and next-generation services for Communication Service Providers. With the right SI partner, Communication Service Providers can fully leverage the operational and cost benefits of implementing, customizing and managing the solution. Oracle OSS practice at Prodapt, with the right mix of skilled professionals, processes, technology & infrastructure, offers complete range of Pre-implementation, Implementation and Post-implementation services. Pre-implementation Services Implementation Services Post-implementation Services Business Process Study Turnkey Implementation Version Upgrades/OBF Upgrades Planning towards a COTS Functional Consulting Migration from Legacy/COTS Implementation Feature Enablement 24 X 7 Support & Maintenance Gap & Fitment Analysis Product Extensions Trouble-shooting, Break-fix errors Migration Study Product Customization/ Fine Tuning of Configuration & Project Scoping & Sizing Automation Programs Enhancements & Rollout When properly integrated into your IT landscape, MetaSolv/ MetaSolv/ OSM/ UIM OSM/UIM streamline operations, thereby reducing costs, Implementation Services providing a better customer experience and shortening your time to market for products and services. Turnkey Implementation Prodapt’s Oracle OSS competencies span implementations Prodapt’s methodology for COTS implementation for various services and technologies, including the encompasses a sound theoretical foundation, which lays emphasis on the alignment of information systems with the MetaSolv M6, OSM, UIM for order and inventory organizational objectives and priorities. management system ASAP for provisioning of all switch types Standard process adopted by PRODAPT provides the Network Mediation to support differentiated pricing blueprint for effective business operations. Our tried and for complex bundled services and tested COTS Implementation Approach (COTSIA) provides Network Integrity implementation and upgrade services enabling faster implementation of MetaSolv/OSM/UIM applications.

2. Oracle MetaSolv / Order & Service Management (OSM) / Unified Inventory Management (UIM) Offerings COTSIA follows a phased implementation and upgrade process covering the following aspects: - Customization Prodapt’s code-level knowledge of MetaSolv/OSM/UIM applications allows customization of software to better suit customer’s needs. Rather than create clunky workaround processes for off-the-shelf software that does not quite fit, Project Preparation Prodapt can tailor applications for optimum efficiency. Prodapt can build a development environment, run QA and user tests and deploy the customized changes so the impact on business is minimal. Business Blueprint Prodapt has an established model for automation and customization that includes but not limited to the Service Provisioning Regulated and non-regulatory Ordering automation Realization Inventory Management Prodapt’s rich experience in the MetaSolv data model and consulting exposure provides value added behavior in Final Preparation Automation Automation of Circuit & Telephone numbers based on client needs and help define process efficient methodologies Task related automation to reduce the manual overhead on the resources Go Live & Support Network design for various technologies and help reduce manual errors during provisioning Convergent Products Provisioning This includes design and implementation of the provisioning process of fixed division for the launch of convergent products Benefits of Implementation through COTSIA approach: Enablers: Minimizes the length of time between installation Zero Touch Provisioning in MSSv6 – All tasks and production start up associated with Provisioning Plan can be automated Maximizes the utilization of consultant and in MetaSolv. In cases where orders are accepted customer resources through CRM or POS the orders can be routed to MetaSolv through an interface. This solution helps Results in a “model” that can be used with other save time, cost and reduce errors. implementations of OSS BSS COTS products Incorporates a process oriented approach to AcceloPRO 2.0 – ETL Accelerator for product training MSS/OSM/UIM migrations that provides faster, risk free, accurate migrations from Legacy/MetaSolv/ Involves the user community OSM/UIM sources to MetaSolv/OSM/UIM target 2 | www.prodapt.com

3. Oracle MetaSolv / Order & Service Management (OSM) / Unified Inventory Management (UIM) Offerings application. Helps improve data accuracy and reduce Integration system down time by 70% during ETL migration of Oracle MetaSolv/OSM/UIM applications. Service providers who do not adequately plan for the integration of MetaSolv/OSM/UIM with the IT landscape MetaSolv Mobile Application - Inventory Viewer will risk delayed time to market, higher deployment costs application that links MetaSolv DB to Windows Phone. and dissatisfied customers. Prodapt can help service providers plan for and address key MetaSolv/OSM/UIM integration issues through our comprehensive OSS product portfolio and integration services. Working closely with your engineering and IT teams, Prodapt can address critical operational issues including Inventory, Order Management and Service provisioning. Prodapt’s Value added integration framework will help in Identifying and documenting detailed OSS integration requirements Generating a solution-driven scope-of-work with a measurable timetable Developing a customized solution to meet your unique needs Testing and validating the solution in a safe lab environment Cost containment for the identified solution Conducting personalized user training/workshops Providing production support and ongoing solution maintenance MetaSolv Mobile Application Architecture - high level Business framework is built in the WCF The DB is consumed by service layer which MS Entity framework exposes the contracts Windows Mobile Convert the DB as 7.1 App MS Entity classes and objects WCF Service MetaSolv DB Framework Equipment Viewer DB is represented as classes and properties Consumes the Services 3 | www.prodapt.com
